thread.section_title: Ticketmaster Resale Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ticketmaster Resale | resale.ticketmaster.com.au
thread.title: Tim

author: Tim
title: Tim
text: I bought tickets to see a band I really wanted to see but unfortunately I didnt check my dates and found out that it clashed with an important event i had to go to. So I signed up with Ticketmaster reseller. The sign up process was super easy and very quick. I put my tickets up for sale on their service at face value, as I believe you shouldn't try and make extra money off people whom wanna see music they are passionate about and they were resold within the week, which I thought was very quick. I received an email with all the information about the process and it all went off without a problem. I would totally recommend this service to anyone whom was in the same boat as me, super easy and super effective. Thanks again and keep up the great service
